verses.verse: And he spoke <WG3004> a parable <WG3850> to them to this <WG3588> end, that men ought <WG1163> always <WG3842> to pray, <WG4336> and not to faint; <WG1573>
Saying, <WG3004> There was in a city <WG4172> a judge, <WG2923> which feared <WG5399> not God, <WG2316> neither <WG3366> regarded <WG1788> man: <WG444>
And there was a widow <WG5503> in that city; <WG4172> and she came <WG2064> to him, saying, <WG3004> Avenge <WG1556> me of my <WG3450> adversary. <WG476>

And he would <WG2309> not for a while: <WG5550> but afterward <WG3326> <WG5023> he said <WG2036> within <WG1722> himself, <WG1438> Though <WG1499> I fear <WG5399> not God, <WG2316> nor <WG3756> regard <WG1788> man; <WG444>

Yet <WG1065> because <WG1223> this <WG5026> widow <WG5503> troubles <WG3930> <WG2873> me, I will avenge <WG1556> her, lest <WG2443> <WG3361> by her continual <WG1519> <WG5056> coming <WG2064> she weary <WG5299> me.

And shall not God <WG2316> avenge <WG4160> his own elect, <WG1588> which <WG3588> cry <WG994> day <WG2250> and night <WG3571> to him, though <WG2532> he bear <WG3114> long <WG3114> with them?

I tell <WG3004> you that he will avenge <WG4160> them speedily. <WG1722> <WG5034> Nevertheless <WG4133> when the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> comes, <WG2064> shall he find <WG2147> faith <WG4102> on <WG1909> the earth? <WG1093>

And he spoke <WG2036> this <WG5026> parable <WG3850> to certain <WG5100> which <WG3588> trusted <WG3982> in themselves <WG1438> that they were righteous, <WG1342> and despised <WG1848> others: <WG3062>
Two <WG1417> men <WG444> went <WG305> up into <WG1519> the temple <WG2411> to pray; <WG4336> the one <WG1520> a Pharisee, <WG5330> and the other <WG2087> a publican. <WG5057>

The Pharisee <WG5330> stood <WG2476> and prayed <WG4336> thus <WG5023> with himself, <WG1438> God, <WG2316> I thank <WG2168> you, that I am <WG1510> not as other <WG3062> men <WG444> are, extortionists, <WG727> unjust, <WG94> adulterers, <WG3432> or <WG2228> even <WG2532> as this <WG3778> publican. <WG5057>
I fast <WG3522> twice <WG1364> in the week, <WG4521> I give tithes <WG586> of all <WG3956> that I possess. <WG2932>

And the publican, <WG5057> standing <WG2476> afar <WG3113> off, would <WG2309> not lift <WG1869> up so <WG3761> much <WG3761> as his eyes <WG3788> to heaven, <WG3772> but smote <WG5180> on his breast, <WG4738> saying, <WG3004> God <WG2316> be merciful <WG2433> to me a sinner. <WG268>

I tell <WG3004> you, this <WG3778> man went <WG2597> down <WG2597> to his house <WG3624> justified <WG1344> rather than <WG2228> the other: <WG1565> for every <WG3956> one that exalts <WG5312> himself <WG1438> shall be abased; <WG5013> and he that humbles <WG5013> himself <WG1438> shall be exalted. <WG5312>
And they brought <WG4374> to him also <WG2532> infants, <WG1025> that he would touch <WG680> them: but when his disciples <WG3101> saw <WG1492> it, they rebuked <WG2008> them.

But Jesus <WG2424> called <WG4341> them to him, and said, <WG2036> Suffer <WG863> little <WG3813> children <WG3813> to come <WG2064> to me, and forbid <WG2967> them not: for of such <WG5108> is the kingdom <WG932> of God. <WG2316>

Truly <WG281> I say <WG3004> to you, Whoever <WG3739> <WG1437> shall not receive <WG1209> the kingdom <WG932> of God <WG2316> as a little <WG3813> child <WG3813> shall in no <WG3364> wise enter <WG1525> therein. <WG1519> <WG846>
And a certain <WG5100> ruler <WG758> asked <WG1905> him, saying, <WG3004> Good <WG18> Master, <WG1320> what <WG5101> shall I do <WG4160> to inherit <WG2816> eternal <WG166> life? <WG2222>
And Jesus <WG2424> said <WG2036> to him, Why <WG5101> call <WG3004> you me good? <WG18> none <WG3762> is good, <WG18> save <WG1508> one, <WG1520> that is, God. <WG2316>

You know <WG1492> the commandments, <WG1785> Do not commit <WG3431> adultery, <WG3431> Do not kill, <WG5407> Do not steal, <WG2813> Do not bear <WG5576> false <WG5576> witness, <WG5576> Honor <WG5091> your father <WG3962> and your mother.
And he said, <WG2036> All <WG3956> these <WG5023> have I kept <WG5442> from my youth <WG3503> up.

Now <WG1161> when Jesus <WG2424> heard <WG191> these <WG5023> things, he said <WG2036> to him, Yet <WG2089> lack <WG3007> you one <WG1520> thing: sell <WG4453> all <WG3956> that you have, <WG2192> and distribute <WG1239> to the poor, <WG4434> and you shall have <WG2192> treasure <WG2344> in heaven: <WG3772> and come, <WG1204> follow <WG190> me.
And when he heard <WG191> this, <WG5023> he was very <WG4970> sorrowful: <WG4036> for he was very <WG4970> rich. <WG4145>

And when Jesus <WG2424> saw <WG1492> that he was very <WG4036> sorrowful, <WG4036> he said, <WG2036> How <WG4459> hardly <WG1423> shall they that have <WG2192> riches <WG5536> enter <WG1525> into <WG1519> the kingdom <WG932> of God! <WG2316>

For it is easier <WG2123> for a camel <WG2574> to go <WG1525> through <WG1223> a needle's <WG4476> eye, <WG5168> than <WG2228> for a rich <WG4145> man to enter <WG1525> into <WG1519> the kingdom <WG932> of God. <WG2316>
And they that heard <WG191> it said, <WG2036> Who <WG5101> then <WG2532> can <WG1410> be saved? <WG4982>
And he said, <WG2036> The things which are impossible <WG102> with men <WG444> are possible <WG1415> with God. <WG2316>
Then <WG1161> Peter <WG4074> said, <WG2036> See, <WG2400> we have left <WG863> all, <WG3956> and followed <WG190> you.

And he said <WG2036> to them, Truly <WG281> I say <WG3004> to you, There is no <WG3762> man <WG3762> that has left <WG863> house, <WG3614> or <WG2228> parents, <WG1118> or <WG2228> brothers, <WG80> or <WG2228> wife, <WG1135> or <WG2228> children, <WG5043> for the kingdom <WG932> of God's <WG2316> sake, <WG1752>
Who <WG3739> shall not receive <WG618> manifold <WG4179> more <WG4179> in this <WG5129> present time, <WG2540> and in the world <WG165> to come <WG2064> life <WG2222> everlasting. <WG166>

Then <WG1161> he took <WG3880> to him the twelve, <WG1427> and said <WG2036> to them, Behold, <WG2400> we go <WG305> up to Jerusalem, <WG2414> and all <WG3956> things that are written <WG1125> by the prophets <WG4396> concerning the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> shall be accomplished. <WG5055>
For he shall be delivered <WG3860> to the Gentiles, <WG1484> and shall be mocked, <WG1702> and spitefully <WG5195> entreated, <WG5195> and spitted <WG1716> on: <WG1716>
And they shall whip <WG3146> him, and put <WG615> him to death: <WG615> and the third <WG5154> day <WG2250> he shall rise <WG450> again. <WG450>

And they understood <WG4920> none <WG3762> of these <WG5130> things: and this <WG5124> saying <WG4487> was hid <WG2928> from them, neither <WG2532> <WG3756> knew <WG1097> they the things which were spoken. <WG3004>
And it came <WG1096> to pass, that as he was come <WG1448> near <WG1448> to Jericho, <WG2410> a certain <WG5100> blind <WG5185> man sat <WG2521> by the way <WG3598> side <WG3844> begging: <WG4319>
And hearing <WG191> the multitude <WG3793> pass <WG1279> by, he asked <WG4441> what <WG5101> it meant. <WG1498>
And they told <WG518> him, that Jesus <WG2424> of Nazareth <WG3478> passes <WG3928> by.
And he cried, <WG994> saying, <WG3004> Jesus, <WG2424> you Son <WG5207> of David, <WG1138> have mercy <WG1653> on me.

And they which went <WG4254> before <WG4254> rebuked <WG2008> him, that he should hold <WG4623> his peace: <WG4623> but he cried <WG2896> so <WG3123> much <WG4183> the more, <WG3123> You son <WG5207> of David, <WG1138> have mercy <WG1653> on me.
And Jesus <WG2424> stood, <WG2476> and commanded <WG2753> him to be brought <WG71> to him: and when he was come <WG1448> near, <WG1448> he asked <WG1905> him,
Saying, <WG3004> What <WG5101> will <WG2309> you that I shall do <WG4160> to you? And he said, <WG2036> Lord, <WG2962> that I may receive <WG308> my sight. <WG308>
And Jesus <WG2424> said <WG2036> to him, Receive <WG308> your sight: <WG308> your faith <WG4102> has saved <WG4982> you.

And immediately <WG3916> he received <WG308> his sight, <WG308> and followed <WG190> him, glorifying <WG1392> God: <WG2316> and all <WG3956> the people, <WG2992> when they saw <WG1492> it, gave <WG1325> praise <WG136> to God. <WG2316>
